title: Age of Magic
description: A new age has dawned. Will Jo be its savior, or its downfall?The Society is over and its members are now free in a new world. But freedom is not what it seems, and their true enemy is still at large.Joining together one last time, the members lend their magic and knowledge to Jo to finally put an end to the madness of Chaos and finally free Snow. There's no easy path to victory, and securing the future of the new Age of Magic may cost Jo everything. Will her plan be enough to finally end a divine war that has spanned across thousands of years? Or is this new Age of Magic merely a precursor to the final Age of Oblivion?Age of Magic is a full length fantasy/paranormal romance novel that's the third book in the Wish Quartet, a four-book series that establishes the Age of Magic universe. It's perfect for readers who love time travel, twisty slow-burn stories, and steamy (sexy) romance.
author: Elise Kova
